actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to increase the independence of psychologists with respect to services furnished at a comprehensive outpatient rehabilitation facility.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to cover rehabilitative psychological services furnished to outpatients of comprehensive outpatient rehabilitation facilities. Requires that each patient at such facilities be under a physician's care to the extent required by State law.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to increase the independence of psychologists with respect to services furnished at a comprehensive outpatient rehabilitation facility.
